css_btn_actif: QPushButton{border: none; background-color:  rgb(41,37,116);color: white;border-radius: 5px;font: 11px 'Arial';font-weight: bold;word-wrap: normal;}
css_btn_courant: QPushButton{border: none; background-color:  rgb(239, 120, 88);color: white;border-radius: 5px;font: 11px 'Arial';font-weight: bold;word-wrap: normal;}
css_btn_inactif: QPushButton{border: none; background-color:  rgb(201,200,220);color: white;border-radius: 5px;font: 11px 'Arial';font-weight: bold;word-wrap: normal;}
